conversion_verification.notes: The 3D render clearly shows walls with height and thickness, a perceptible interior volume, and is viewed from an angled perspective with the roof removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have height and thickness (5), floors are separated (3), interior volume is perceivable (4), proper 3D wall corner geometry (3). Angled view (5), interior visible from elevated perspective (3). Minimal perspective distortion (2). Roof cleanly removed (5). Interior spaces are fully visible (3). Clean geometry (2).

geometric_accuracy.notes: Correct number of rooms (3), correct adjacency relationships (4), relative room proportions are mostly preserved (3). Major room identities match (2). Major wall positions align well with 2D plan (5). Wall lengths are generally proportional (3). Internal partitions are correctly placed (2). Doors are present and on correct walls, but some are missing in the 3D render (3/4). Windows are present and on correct walls (2). Openings are proportionally sized and oriented (1/2, some are off).

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture is present in some rooms (beds, sofas, tables) (3/4). Kitchen elements are present and well-placed (2). Bathroom fixtures are present (2). Furniture is placed in correct rooms (3). Furniture scale is reasonable (2). Orientation is logical (1/2).

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, openings clearly distinguishable (4). Geometry is readable (4). Interior is clearly visible (3). Lighting does not obscure geometry (3). Consistent material usage (2). No major rendering artifacts (2). Clean background (2).

detected_errors.description: Some doors and windows from the 2D plan are missing or significantly altered in the 3D render (e.g., the entry door is an opening, the WC door is missing). The window in the 'Dining' area is not present or represented differently.
The 'Linen' closet in the entry and the 'Robe' in Bedroom 1 are not represented in the 3D model, implying missing built-in furniture or storage.

summary: The conversion accurately captures geometric fundamentals and room layout, but has minor discrepancies in specific door/window elements and some interior fittings.
